snippet.title: Kulebra and the Souls of Limbo - Official Trailer | Game Devs of Color Expo 2024
snippet.description: Use your wits, kindness, and maybe a good whack to gather clues, items, and evidence that will help the residents of Limbo move on. Untangling an afterlife is no easy feat, especially when you don’t have feet! Check out the Kulebra and the Souls of Limbo trailer to meet the characters and see the vibrant world of this upcoming game. Kulebra and the Souls of Limbo will be available on PC and Nintendo Switch, and a demo is out now on Steam.
